title: "hide"
author: "Harry Lu"
output: html_document

```{r,echo=FALSE,warning=FALSE,message=FALSE,fig.align="center",eval=F}
library(tidyverse)
cool_function=function(x,alpha){
  return(sin(alpha*x))
}
xs=seq(from=0,to=pi*1.5,by=0.005)
ys=cool_function(xs,1)
results=data_frame(xs,ys,alpha="1")
for(alpha in seq(from=0,to=3,by=0.1)){
  results=results %>% 
    bind_rows(data_frame(
      xs, 
      ys=cool_function(xs, alpha),
      alpha=as.character(alpha)
    ))
}

ggplot(results,aes(x=xs,y=ys,color=alpha))+
  geom_line()+
  theme_bw()+
  theme(legend.position="none")
```
